metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog for one of the Flaming Fist privates sparring at the training grounds at the barracks near the Basilisk Gate.

0.speaker: Fist Crosse
0.text: 'Put all your weight in it', she says. But I can't give more than I've got.
0.context: NodeContext: Training as hard as he can but the drillmaster still thinks he's weak.

1.speaker: Fist Crosse
1.text: Distract the Gauntlet will you? I think she's set on killing me.
1.context: NodeContext: Training as hard as he can but the drillmaster still thinks he's weak.
